data_table.description: This subject consent file includes subject IDs, consent group information, and affection status for childhood obesity.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject. Obese is defined as overweight proband between the ages 4-19 y, using a bivariate ascertainment scheme (i.e., obese >= 95th percentile for BMI (2000 CDC Growth Reference) and >= 85th percentile for FM (CNRC body composition reference database).
